verses.verse: And Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Leah <S%H3812><s%>, which she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And when SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, prince <S%H5387><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her, he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her, and lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with her, and defiled her <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

And his soul <S%H5315><s%> clave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Dinah <S%H1783><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and he loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the damsel <S%H5291><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> kindly <S%H3820><s%> unto the damsel <S%H5291><s%>.

And SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Get <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me this damsel <S%H3207><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%>: now his sons <S%H1121><s%> were with his cattle <S%H4735><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> held his peace <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8689><s%> until they were come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> to commune <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it: and the men <S%H582><s%> were grieved <S%H6087><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and they were very <S%H3966><s%> wroth <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because he had wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in lying <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>; which thing ought not to be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> communed <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The soul <S%H5315><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> longeth <S%H2836><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for your daughter <S%H1323><s%>: I pray you give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> her him to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And make ye marriages <S%H2859><s%> <S%H8690><s%> with us, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto us, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto you.

And ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with us: and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before you <S%H6440><s%>; dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and trade <S%H5503><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye therein, and get you possessions <S%H270><s%> <S%H8734><s%> therein.

And SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her father <S%H1><s%> and unto her brethren <S%H251><s%>, Let me find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and what ye shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Ask <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me never so much <S%H3966><s%> dowry <S%H4119><s%> and gift <S%H4976><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according as ye shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me: but give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me the damsel <S%H5291><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> and Hamor <S%H2544><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> deceitfully <S%H4820><s%>, and said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, because he had defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>:

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, We cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> our sister <S%H269><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> that is uncircumcised <S%H6190><s%>; for that were a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto us:
But in this <S%H2063><s%> will we consent <S%H225><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto you: If ye will be as we be, that every male <S%H2145><s%> of you be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%>;

Then will we give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> unto you, and we will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us, and we will dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with you, and we will become one <S%H259><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

But if ye will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto us, to be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%>; then will we take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> our daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and we will be gone <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
And their words <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5869><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%>, and SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> Hamor's <S%H2544><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>.

And the young man <S%H5288><s%> deferred <S%H309><s%> <S%H8765><s%> not to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%>, because he had delight <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>: and he was more honourable <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8737><s%> than all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>.

And Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of their city <S%H5892><s%>, and communed <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with the men <S%H582><s%> of their city <S%H5892><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

These men <S%H582><s%> are peaceable <S%H8003><s%> with <S%H854><s%> us; therefore let them dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and trade <S%H5503><s%> <S%H8799><s%> therein; for the land <S%H776><s%>, behold, it is large <S%H7342><s%> enough <S%H3027><s%> for them <S%H6440><s%>; let us take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> to us for wives <S%H802><s%>, and let us give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them our daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Only herein <S%H2063><s%> will the men <S%H582><s%> consent <S%H225><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto us for to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with us, to be one <S%H259><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, if every male <S%H2145><s%> among us be circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, as they are circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

Shall not their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and their substance <S%H7075><s%> and every beast <S%H929><s%> of theirs be ours? only let us consent <S%H225><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto them, and they will dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with us.

And unto Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and unto SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all that went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>; and every male <S%H2145><s%> was circumcised <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, all that went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%>.

And it came to pass on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, when they were sore <S%H3510><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, that two <S%H8147><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, Dinah's <S%H1783><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%>, took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the city <S%H5892><s%> boldly <S%H983><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the males <S%H2145><s%>.

And they slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Hamor <S%H2544><s%> and SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%> out <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of SH'khem's <S%H7927><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the slain <S%H2491><s%>, and spoiled <S%H962><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, because they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>.

They took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and their oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and their asses <S%H2543><s%>, and that which was in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and that which was in the field <S%H7704><s%>,

And all their wealth <S%H2428><s%>, and all their little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and their wives <S%H802><s%> took they captive <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and spoiled <S%H962><s%> <S%H8799><s%> even all that was in the house <S%H1004><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> and Levi <S%H3878><s%>, Ye have troubled <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me to make me to stink <S%H887><s%> <S%H8687><s%> among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, among the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>: and I being few <S%H4962><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%>, they shall gather themselves together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%> against me, and slay me <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; and I shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, I and my house <S%H1004><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Should he deal <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with our sister <S%H269><s%> as with an harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ?
